title: Looking for a strong pair of audio headphones, preferably with a good microphone below $200.
body:
Can anyone help me out? I was looking at these

https://drop.com/buy/massdrop-x-sennheiser-pc37x-gaming-headset?utm_medium=influencer&utm_source=youtube&utm_term=77778616&utm_content=BellularGaming&mode=shop_open&fe=su3&pc=TNITHTIRZXAFXBWYUZWCMYNL

And honestly, they look amazing, but they're open-backed, which makes it kind of weird to use a microphone with, despite the fact that the mic is honestly pretty good quality.
